brand.name: CodeWorks Lab
brand.description: We create lifestyle utility tools and self-management journals. We do not judge. We record, display, and assist.

hero.title: Your Everyday
hero.subtitle: CodeWorks Lab's Safe Way 10 lineup - lifestyle utility tools and self-management journals designed to make your daily life easier.
hero.coreMessage: We do not judge. We record, display, and assist.

apps.title: Safe Way 10 Lineup
apps.subtitle: Lifestyle utilities and self-management journals for everyday life

wayback.name: WayBack
wayback.description: Offline maps, navigation, and location-based travel guide. Your companion for safe journeys.

wayfit.name: WayFit
wayfit.description: Take photos of your food to keep a personal meal diary and get approximate nutritional information.

waymuscle.name: WayMuscle
waymuscle.description: AI exercise partner that helps you work out with proper form at home.

waybrain.name: WayBrain
waybrain.description: Brain training game that keeps your mind active through quizzes and conversations.

wayview.name: WayView
wayview.description: Visual assistance tool that enlarges small text and reads it aloud. A digital reading magnifier.

waysound.name: WaySound
waysound.description: Real-time transcription notepad that converts speech to text. A subtitle generator for conversations.

waylog.name: WayLog
waylog.description: Alarm clock that reminds you when to take vitamins or supplements. Keep track of your intake history.

wayspot.name: WaySpot
wayspot.description: Photo album that organizes pictures of body changes (spots, marks) in chronological order.

wayrest.name: WayRest
wayrest.description: Sleep recorder that captures sounds (snoring, sleep talking) while you rest. Check your nighttime sounds.

waystory.name: WayStory
waystory.description: Turn your life stories into a book through guided conversations. A publishing and writing assistant.

features.title: Why Choose Safe Way 10?
features.subtitle: Tools that record, display, and assist - without making judgments

recording.title: Smart Recording
recording.description: Automatically log and organize your daily activities and data.

display.title: Clear Display
display.description: View your recorded data in intuitive charts and timelines.

assist.title: Helpful Assistance
assist.description: Get reminders, tips, and guidance to support your daily routines.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data stays yours. Encrypted storage with full privacy control.

offline.title: Offline Ready
offline.description: Core features work without internet. Your data is always accessible.

sync.title: 100% Local Storage
sync.description: All data is stored only on your device. No personal information is ever sent or stored externally.

simple.title: Simple & Intuitive
simple.description: Designed for everyone. Easy to use regardless of tech experience.

support.title: Caring Support
support.description: Responsive customer support ready to help when you need it.

reviews.title: User Reviews
reviews.subtitle: {{count}} users rated us {{rating}} stars on average
reviews.name: Name
reviews.contentPlaceholder: Share your experience with us (minimum 10 characters)
reviews.submitSuccess: Review submitted successfully. It will be visible after approval.
reviews.noReviews: No reviews yet. Be the first to share your experience!

blog.title: Blog & News
blog.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest news and tips from CodeWorks Lab

manual.title: User Guide
manual.subtitle: Learn how to get the most out of our apps

download.title: Download the App
download.text: Search for our apps on the App Store or Google Play and download them for free.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.text: Sign up with your email or social accounts (Google, Apple, etc.) for quick registration.

setup.title: Initial Setup
setup.text: Enter your basic information to receive personalized recommendations.

basic.title: Basic Information
basic.text: Go to Profile > Settings to update your name, preferences, and other details.

goals.title: Set Your Goals
goals.text: Choose your objectives and let us help you track your progress.

sync.title: Sync Settings
sync.text: Connect with other platforms to automatically sync your data.

tracking.title: Activity Recording
tracking.text: Tap the + button on the home screen to record your activities.

auto.title: Auto Recording
auto.text: Connect your wearable device for automatic activity logging.

routines.title: Create Routines
routines.text: Save frequently used activities as routines for quick access.

activity.title: Activity Reminders
activity.text: Set custom reminders to stay on track with your routines.

hydration.title: Hydration Alerts
hydration.text: Get periodic reminders to stay hydrated throughout the day.

sleep.title: Rest Reminders
sleep.text: Receive bedtime notifications for better rest habits.

contact.title: Need Help?
contact.subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us and we'll get back to you soon.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Category
contact.success: Message sent successfully. We'll respond as soon as possible.

free.question: Are the apps free?
free.answer: No! Try all features free for 2 weeks! Then subscribe monthly or yearly!

devices.question: Which devices are supported?
devices.answer: Available on iOS 14+ and Android 8.0+. Also supports Apple Watch and Galaxy Watch integration.

integration.question: Can I connect other apps?
integration.answer: Yes! Our apps integrate with Apple Health, Google Fit, and Samsung Health where applicable.

privacy.question: Is my data secure?
privacy.answer: All data is end-to-end encrypted and we comply with GDPR and privacy regulations. We never share data without consent.

cancel.question: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: Your data is preserved even after cancellation. Resume anytime and pick up where you left off.

footer.description: We record, display, and assist. Building lifestyle tools for everyday life.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: CodeWorks Lab ("Company") complies with applicable privacy laws and regulations and is committed to protecting users' personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.desc: We may collect the following types of information:
section1.item1: Log information automatically generated during app usage
section1.item2: Device information for error analysis (OS version, device model, etc.)
section1.item3: Information you directly provide (name, email for inquiries)
section1.item4: Nickname and email (optional) when writing reviews
section1.noSensitive: We do not collect sensitive information such as health data, biometric data, location data, contacts, photos, or voice recordings.
section1.noPayment: We do not process in-app payments directly. All payment information is processed through the Apple App Store or Google Play Store.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Collection and Use
section2.desc: Collected information is used only for the following purposes:
section2.item2: Error analysis and service stability enhancement
section2.item3: Customer inquiry response and complaint handling

section3.title: 3. Retention Period
section3.item1: Personal information is deleted without delay when the purpose of collection is achieved.
section3.item2: However, if retention is required by applicable laws, it will be safely stored for the required period.
section3.item3: Records related to contracts or withdrawal: 5 years
section3.item4: Records related to consumer complaints or disputes: 3 years

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Disclosure
section4.desc: We do not provide personal information to third parties in principle. Exceptions are made only in the following cases:
section4.item1: When the user has given prior consent
section4.item2: When required by law or requested by investigative authorities following legal procedures

section5.title: 5. External Services
section5.desc: We may use the following external services for service improvement:
section5.note: Please refer to each service's privacy policy for their data handling practices.
section5.overseas: External services (Firebase, Gemini API) may use overseas servers, and data is processed according to each service's privacy policy.

section6.title: 6. Data Deletion
section6.desc: We delete personal information without delay when the retention period expires or the purpose of processing is achieved.
section6.item1: Electronic files: Securely deleted to prevent recovery

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.desc: You may exercise the following rights at any time:
section7.item4: Request to stop processing personal information
section7.note: You can submit requests through the contact form on our Guide page.

section8.title: 8. Security Measures
section8.desc: We implement the following measures to ensure the security of personal information:
section8.item3: Minimizing and training personnel handling personal information

section9.title: 9. Privacy Officer
section9.desc: For inquiries regarding personal information processing, please contact us through the contact form on our Guide page.
section9.name: Name: Rustic Sage

section10.title: 10. Policy Changes
section10.desc: This Privacy Policy is effective as of the date stated above. Any changes will be announced through our website at least 7 days before taking effect.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of all services ("Service") provided by CodeWorks Lab ("Company"). By using our Service, you agree to these Terms.

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.desc: These Terms establish the conditions and procedures for using the Safe Way 10 lineup apps and related services, as well as the rights, obligations, and responsibilities of the Company and users.

section2.title: 2. Definitions
section2.def1: refers to all services provided through apps and websites operated by the Company.
section2.def2: refers to anyone who accesses and uses the Service in accordance with these Terms.
section2.def3: refers to all information created, posted, or stored by users within the Service.

section3.title: 3. Effect and Modification of Terms
section3.item1: These Terms apply to all users who wish to use the Service.
section3.item2: The Company may modify these Terms if necessary, and changes will be announced through the app or website.
section3.item3: Users who do not agree to the modified Terms may discontinue use and withdraw from the Service.
section3.item4: Continued use of the Service after the effective date of changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

section4.title: 4. Provision of Service
section4.item1: The Company strives to provide stable service.
section4.item2: Service types, usage methods, and hours are determined by the Company.
section4.item3: The Company may modify or discontinue all or part of the Service for improvement, technical necessity, or operational reasons.
section4.item4: The Service may be temporarily suspended for regular or emergency maintenance.

section5.title: 5. User Obligations
section5.desc: Users shall not engage in the following:
section5.item1: Violating laws or these Terms through use of the Service
section5.item2: Infringing on intellectual property rights, portrait rights, or other rights of the Company or third parties
section5.item3: Interfering with normal operation of the Service
section5.item4: Collecting or misusing other users' personal information
section5.item5: Unauthorized commercial use of the Service

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.item1: Intellectual property rights for all content included in the Service (text, images, software, etc.) belong to the Company.
section6.item2: Copyright for content posted by users within the Service belongs to the respective users.
section6.item3: Users may not reproduce, distribute, or modify Service content without prior written consent from the Company.

section7.title: 7. Paid Services and Payment
section7.item1: Some services may be provided for a fee. Pricing and payment methods are specified within each service.
section7.item2: Refunds for paid services follow applicable laws and the Company's refund policy.
section7.item3: Subscription services may automatically renew unless cancelled by the user.

section8.title: 8. Disclaimer
section8.item1: The Company is not liable for inability to provide Service due to force majeure such as natural disasters, war, or telecommunications service interruptions.
section8.item2: The Company is not liable for service disruptions caused by user negligence.
section8.item3: The Company does not guarantee the accuracy or reliability of information obtained through the Service.
section8.item4: The Company has no obligation to intervene in disputes between users or between users and third parties, and is not liable for resulting damages.

section9.title: 9. Liability for Damages
section9.item1: If the Company or a user violates these Terms and causes damage to the other party, they are liable for compensation.
section9.item2: However, liability may be limited in cases without intent or gross negligence.

section10.title: 10. Dispute Resolution
section10.item1: Disputes arising in connection with these Terms shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea.
section10.item2: In case of disputes between the Company and users, both parties shall negotiate in good faith for amicable resolution.
section10.item3: If negotiation fails, jurisdiction shall be with the court as provided by the Civil Procedure Act.

section11.title: 11. Contact
section11.desc: For inquiries regarding Service use, please submit through the contact form on our Guide page.

supplementary.title: Supplementary Provisions
supplementary.desc: These Terms are effective as of February 3, 2026.
